actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish in the State of New Jersey the Treasure Island National Historical Site.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire specified lands and buildings in the area of Treasure Island, Kingswood Township in Hunterdon County, New Jersey. Designates such area as the Treasure Island National Historical Site in recognition of the oldest Boy Scout camp in the United States.

titles.title: A bill to establish in the State of New Jersey the Treasure Island National Historical Site.
